abstract: Sumitomo Trust and Banking is in final talks to buy Citigroup’s asset management arm in Japan for more than 100 billion yen ($1 billion), the Nikkei business daily reported.
snippet: Sumitomo Trust and Banking is in final talks to buy Citigroup’s asset management arm in Japan for more than 100 billion yen ($1 billion), the Nikkei business daily reported.
lead_paragraph: Sumitomo Trust and Banking is in final talks to buy Citigroup‘s asset management arm in Japan for more than 100 billion yen ($1 billion), the Nikkei business daily reported Friday.

headline.main: Sumitomo in Final Talks for Citi Unit in Japan
